name: Ricochet (itch) (Okidoki)
description:
The objective of the game is to shoot the slimes that will try to kill you. The catch is - the gun is OUT OF CONTROL If you miss an enemy, the bullets will bounce off the walls and can harm you if you aren't careful! When the bar above your head runs out, the bullet will fire (whether you want to or not!)

Please play, enjoy and review!

Team:

Programming/Game Design: Luke Gahng-Guzen

Pixel Art/Animation: Jonathan Martin

Level Design/SFX: Harvey Bloomer

Music: Nelson Gong
